channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Gaudreau brothers to be honored by family, friends and their grieving hockey teammates at funeral
item.description: The Columbus Blue Jackets and NHL Commissioner Gary Bettman are among the mourners expected to attend the funeral for John and Matthew Gaudreau in suburban Philadelphia.

item.title: What to know about the video showing Tyre Nichols’ fatal beating by Memphis police officers
item.description: Footage from Memphis police cameras show a starkly different scene of the January 2023 beating that ended Tyre Nichols’ life than the reports from the officers who delivered the blows.

item.title: Trial for 3 former Memphis officers charged in Tyre Nichols’ death set to begin
item.description: Jury selection is scheduled to begin in the federal trial of three former Memphis officers charged with violating the civil rights of Tyre Nichols.
